item.title: Wall Street analysts don't see Salesforce paying off soon after disappointing current-quarter guidance
item.description: Wall Street's stock price forecasts for Salesforce are all over the place, from 14% downside to upside of more than 70%.

item.title: An under-the-radar AI play that's doubled in six months has even more room to run, BofA says
item.description: Credo Technology on Wednesday reported better-than-expected financial results for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Microsoft, Broadcom, Salesforce, Amazon, AMD & more
item.description: Here are Thursday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: One of the few analysts with a sell rating on Apple just threw in the towel after rally
item.description: MoffettNathanson upgraded the iPhone maker to neutral from sell.

item.title: Chili's parent Brinker International can jump more than 30%, Evercore ISI says
item.description: Analyst David Palmer upgraded the casual dining restaurant company to outperform from in line.
